description: Project will require the assembly and delivery of parachuting system and air pick up delivery to military personnel by a specific date Request for contract award, seals and vars textbooks
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal for CT6 Parachute System Kit Assembly

**Title**: CT6 Parachute System Kit Assembly
**Reference Number**: PW-22-01014735
**Publication Date**: November 24, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: December 8, 2022, 14:00:00

**Background**: The Department of National Defence invites qualified bidders to submit a proposal for the provision of CT6 Parachute System Kit Assembly in response to this Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Key Information**

* **Contractor Requirements**: The successful contractor shall provide CT6 Parachute System Kit Assembly with the following details:
	+ Part No.: ID-81-142
	+ GSIN: N1670
	+ NSN: 1670-21-920-5292
	+ Quantity: 40
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
* **Deliverables**: The successful contractor shall deliver the CT6 Parachute System Kit Assembly to CAAWC Trenton by February 15, 2023, with subsequent deliveries requested by March 31, 2024, and March 31, 2025.
* **Electronic Submission**: Bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

**Trade Agreements and Competitiveness**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements and competitiveness policies:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Land Claim Set Asides (LCSA)
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Quebec-New Brunswick Procurement Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Quebec-New York Corridor Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**

* **Primary Contact**: Debbie Bergeron
* **Email**: debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca
* **Address**: 455 Boul de
